definition: emotional quotient (EQ)/emotional IQ/abbr. for 情緒商數|情绪商数[qing2 xu4 shang1 shu4]
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Let's be an excellent student with high EQ and IQ.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們成爲高情商和高智商的優秀學生。

sentences.english: And this, that is, high EQ performance.
sentences.chinese: 而這，也就是高情商的表現。

sentences.english: People without sufficient EQ will have a hard time in life.
sentences.chinese: 情商不高的人在生活中總是磕磕碰碰。

sentences.english: People are often mistaken in thinking that those with high IQs always have high EQs as well.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常誤認爲智商高的人，情商也會很高。

sentences.english: Being able to sense how others are feeling is an important part of having a good EQ.
sentences.chinese: 善於體察他人的情緒也是高情商的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: Finally, they should strengthen self-training of EQ.
sentences.chinese: 七是加強中專學生情商的自我訓練。

sentences.english: Does it mean that a sophisticated man has a high EQ?
sentences.chinese: 這是否意味着老於世故的人擁有較高的情商？

sentences.english: It seems that less people are both high EQ and high IQ.
sentences.chinese: 似乎很少人同時擁有高情商和高智商。

sentences.english: While IQ gets you hired, EQ gets you promoted.
sentences.chinese: 你因智商受聘，因情商升遷。

sentences.english: This self-knowledge is part of a broader notion sometimes dubbed 'emotional intelligence.'
sentences.chinese: 這種對自身的瞭解是所謂“情商”的一部分。

sentences.english: In other words, it helps you learn better.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，情商高可以幫助孩子學得更好。

sentences.english: His IQ is high, but he has almost no EQ .
sentences.chinese: 他的智商很高，但他的情商幾乎是零。

sentences.english: Seek out an experienced coach to guide youin building EI.
sentences.chinese: 找到一位經驗豐富的教練指導你進行情商建設。

sentences.english: Leaders in the world all have a high level of EQ.
sentences.chinese: 世界各國領導人都是高情商。

sentences.english: The intelligence of emotions plays an important role in our lives.
sentences.chinese: 情商在我們的日常生活中非常重要。

sentences.english: EQ, or emotional intelligence, is as important as IQ for success in today's workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就是情商啦，在當今和IQ可是同等的重要啊。

definition: to train/to educate/to bring up/to nurture/education/culture/upbringing/early conditioning
